* current date and time

```{r}
now()

library(tidyverse)

```

* converting to date and date time

```{r}
df <- tribble(
  ~name, ~dob, ~dtob,
  "John", "10-1-1990", "10-1-1990h 10:20:10",
  "Dave", "20-2-1990", "20-2-1990h 23:20:10",
  "Pat", "31-5-1980", "31-5-1980h 10:20:10",

)
glimpse(df)
df <- df |>
  mutate(
    dob = dmy(dob),
    dtob = dmy_hms(dtob)
  )
df |>
  mutate(
    yr = year(dtob),
    mon = month(dtob),
    day = mday(dtob),
    hr = hour(dtob),
    min = minute(dtob),
    sec = second(dtob),
    .keep = "used"
  )
```
* date_time from individual components: `make_datetime()`


```{r}
flights |>
  select(year, month, day, hour, minute) |>
  mutate(
    departure = make_datetime(year, month, day, hour, minute)
  )
```
